page.title: 01Area around Snape, Yorkshire
page.content: The area is a mixture of fairly flat countryside and woodland and is ideal for those who enjoy peace and quiet and going for walks. The area includes the village of Snape, North Yorkshire, in the Hambleton district. Snape has a population of 322.The area includes Thorp Perrow estate and an arboretum. The following pages include Snape School,The Castle, The Avenue, The Beck, The Mires, Houses, The Village Show, Employers, Farming, Occupations, Childrens Games, Travel, Leisure, Changing Times, Shopping, A Childs Day An Old Persons Day, Thorp Perrow.
